page-500.name: Internal server error: 500 page status
page-500.message: An unexpected error occurred which the internal server did not handle properly
page-500.details: Retry the request and contact the site developers or site admins if the problem persists

page-404.name: Not found
page-404.message: Page or API route not found
page-404.details: Ensure that you have the correct path

funcs-hash-password-invalid.name: Password not provided to hash function
funcs-hash-password-invalid.message: Password not provided or not found, cannot continue hashing operation
funcs-hash-password-invalid.details: Provide a password of valid length and retry the request

funcs-hash-password-error.name: Error hashing provided password
funcs-hash-password-error.details: Retry the request with a different password and contact the site developers or site admins if the problem persists

funcs-verify-password-invalid.name: Password or key not provided to password verification function
funcs-verify-password-invalid.message: Password or key not provided or found, cannot continue to verify the validity of password
funcs-verify-password-invalid.details: Provide a password and the key and retry the request

user-invalid.name: Invalid user
user-invalid.details: Provide a valid user with proper keys and values

user-invalid-name.name: Invalid name
user-invalid-name.message: Name cannot be less than 3 or more than 32 in length
user-invalid-name.details: Provide a name ranging from 3 to 32 characters in length

user-invalid-email.name: Invalid email
user-invalid-email.details: Provide a valid email address: name@example.com

user-weak-password.name: Weak password
user-weak-password.message: Password does not meet the requirements of a strong password
user-weak-password.details: Provide a strong password of at least 12 characters in length with a minimum of 2 lowercase, uppercase, numbers and symbols each

user-no-school.name: No school provided
user-no-school.message: No school or institution is provided
user-no-school.details: Provide your current institution in full (e.g. Anglo-Chinese IB Junior College)

user-invalid-education.name: Invalid education
user-invalid-education.message: No education provided or is invalid
user-invalid-education.details: Provide a valid education type with correct capitals/letter casing:

user-no-telegram.name: Invalid Telegram handle
user-no-telegram.message: No Telegram handle provided or invalid Telegram handle (a-z, 0-9 and underscores)
user-no-telegram.details: Provide a valid Telegram handle without the '@' at the start

user-invalid-referral.name: Invalid referral
user-invalid-referral.message: No referral provided or is invalid

user-invalid-tutoring.name: Invalid streams
user-invalid-tutoring.message: No stream(s) provided or they are invalid

user-invalid-tutee-limit.name: invalid tutee limit
user-invalid-tutee-limit.message: Tutee limit too high or low
user-invalid-tutee-limit.details: Tutee limit should be between 1 and 5

user-invalid-commitment.name: Invalid commitment time
user-invalid-commitment.details: We require a minimum of 1 month commitment for our tutors

user-invalid-communications.name: Invalid communication(s)
user-invalid-communications.details: We only accept the following modes of communication:

user-create-unique.name: Error creating user
user-create-unique.message: User with the same email address has already registered
user-create-unique.details: Create a new account with a different email address

user-create.name: Error creating user
user-create.message: Error occurred while trying to create user
user-create.details: Retry the request with values following the rules and contact the site developers or site admins if the problem persist

user-by-id.name: User ID not provided
user-by-id.message: User ID required to find user by ID

user-by-email.name: User email not provided
user-by-email.message: User email required to find user by email

user-login-invalid.name: Invalid email or password
user-login-invalid.message: Either email or password are not provided or they are invalid

user-login-failed.name: Incorrect email or password
user-login-failed.details: Provide the correct email and password combination

user-unauthenticated.name: Not unauthenticated: cannot proceed
user-unauthenticated.details: Try logging in again at POST /login

user-unauthorized.name: Unauthorized: not allowed
user-unauthorized.message: Either this resource is forbidden for this user or the action is not permitted for this user
user-unauthorized.details: Login with the account that has access to this action or resource

user-update.name: Error modifying user
user-update.message: Error occurred while trying to update or modify user attributes
user-update.details: Retry the request with values following the rules and contact the site developers or site admins if the problem persist

user-tutor-register.name: Error registering tutor
user-tutor-register.message: Error occurred while trying to register a tutor
user-tutor-register.details: Provide the necessary Tutor attributes and retry the request

json-malformed.name: JSON is malformed
json-malformed.message: JSON in request body is malformed and thus, cannot be parsed properly
json-malformed.details: Provide a valid JSON object in the request body
